item.title: Hugo Blog建立成功
item.author: jack842248@gmail.com (JackHuang)
item.description: 我所使用的Hugo主題是beautiful hugo 崁入圖片範例: Sphere Triangle 撰寫數學公式範例: $$ \phi = \frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2} = 1.6180339887\cdots $$ 撰寫程式語言範例: 1 2 3 4 5 var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 撰寫表格範例:
